PHRASE.LANG:

 This locomotion object will boost your speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25 m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Giant Lady Bird
 (2) Giant Locust
 (3) Giant Ant
 (4) Giant Mantis [#Legal]
